videos.description: Malik Monk fires up the Lakers bench with a two-handed dunk vs. the Thunder.

videos.description: Russell Westbrook lobs to Carmelo Anthony for the two-handed finish vs. the Thunder.

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander steps back and banks in a 3-pointer as the third-quarter buzzer sounds.

videos.description: Carmelo Anthony steals the Thunder's inbounds pass and throws up an air ball with the Lakers down late.

videos.description: Josh Giddey tallies 18 points and 10 assists on 7-of-13 shooting as Oklahoma City upset the Lakers.
